channel.title: Victorious Living Chapel: There IS Victory in Jesus!
channel.description: Messages from our pastoral staff to help you discover Victorious Living.
channel.itunes:author: pastoralstaff@vlc-churchincolumbus.org
channel.itunes:subtitle: Messages from our pastoral staff to help you discover Victorious Living.
channel.itunes:summary: Are you looking for answers to life questions in a challenging world? Family, love, and purpose are all answerd in one book. We call it the owners manual, better known as the Bible. The Victorious living family would like to share teachings to help you live a Victorious Life.

item.title: Doing What We Have Become
item.description: Welcome to Victorious Living Chapel online broadcast of our Sabbath services. We bring you a message from our archives from Bishop Danny Blanton. We pray this message brings you into a deeper relationship with God(YAHveh). Please visit our website at www.vlc-churchincolumbus.org.
item.itunes:subtitle: Victorious Living Chapel online broadcast of our Sabbath evening service.

item.title: Kingdom Violence
item.description: Welcome to Victorious Living Chapel online broadcast of our Sabbath morning service 03-25-2006. Bishop Blanton shares from a book by Pastor Jack Hayford titled: Prayer is Invading the Impossible. He also shares his personal spiritual experiences regarding Kingdom Violence and how it affects our spiritual walk. We pray this message brings you into a deeper relationship with God(YAHveh). Please visit our website at www.vlc-churchincolumbus.org.
